channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The workforce is becoming AI-native. Leadership has to evolve
item.description: The new generation began university when ChatGPT launched in 2022 and they now account for roughly half of all ChatGPT usage.

item.title: The science of failing up: Why some leaders rise despite repeated screwups
item.description: Inside corporate America’s hidden mechanics that allow executives to fail upward.

item.title: Greenland Sharks Are Soaking Up Pollutants — That’s Bad News For The Arctic
item.description: Greenland sharks are revealing alarming clues about pollution in one of the planet’s last pristine frontiers.

item.title: Citadel’s shot at Andreessen Horowitz points to coming battle over DeFi and U.S. stock trading
item.description: Tokenized stocks are gaining popularity, but a trading giant owned by billionaire Ken Griffin wants to hit the breaks.

item.title: Netflix needs Warner Bros.’s IP and franchises to remain the default streaming service
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Google Confirms Android Attacks—No Fix For Most Samsung Users
item.description: Your phone is at risk until you get this update — bad news for millions of Galaxy owners.

item.title: Fortune Brainstorm AI San Francisco starts today, with Databricks, OpenAI, Cursor, and more on deck
item.description: Today, Fortune Brainstorm AI starts, and so many key players in AI will be with us live in San Francisco.

item.title: Grand Canyon South Rim hotels forced to close due to water pipe breaks
item.description: Grand Canyon South Rim faces water emergency as broken pipeline forces hotel closures. Park remains open for day visits while water repairs continue.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
